featured.name: Baked Donuts
featured.description: Enjoy the classic taste of freshly baked donuts, made with love by Pastryz. Our donuts are baked fresh daily and come in a variety of flavors, including chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry.

featured.name: Nike Shoes (Red)
featured.description: A stylish and comfortable pair of Nike shoes. Made with soft cotton and a relaxed fit, these shoes are perfect for everyday wear.

featured.name: Egusi soup
featured.description: A delicious and hearty soup made with melon seeds and assorted meats. Served with pounded yam.

featured.name: New Balance Hoodie
featured.description: A stylish and comfortable hoodie from New Balance. Made with soft cotton and a relaxed fit, this hoodie is perfect for everyday wear.

flash-sales.name: iPhone 13
flash-sales.description: The latest iPhone from Apple. Enjoy a stunning 6.1-inch display, a powerful A15 Bionic chip, and a 12MP dual-camera system.

flash-sales.name: Samsung 75-inch Smart TV
flash-sales.description: A large and immersive 75-inch smart TV from Samsung. Enjoy your favorite movies and shows in stunning 4K resolution.

flash-sales.name: Fish and Chips
flash-sales.description: Enjoy the classic taste of British fish and chips, made fresh and served hot at The Seaside Cafe. Our crispy battered fish and perfectly salted chips are the perfect meal for any occasion.

flash-sales.name: Sugared Puff Puff
flash-sales.description: Indulge in the sweet and fluffy goodness of Sugared Puff Puff, a beloved Nigerian snack. Made fresh daily by As E Dey Hot, these bite-sized treats are the perfect way to satisfy your sweet tooth.

for-you.name: Wireless Earbuds
for-you.description: Experience immersive sound quality and convenience with Soundwave's Wireless Earbuds. These sleek and stylish earbuds offer noise-cancellation and touch controls, making them the perfect accessory for any music lover.

for-you.name: Alexa Smart Home Hub
for-you.description: Transform your home into a smart home with the Alexa Smart Home Hub from Home Connect. This device allows you to control all of your smart devices with your voice, and offers a range of features including music streaming and weather updates.

for-you.name: Cotton T-Shirts
for-you.description: Fresh Threads' Cotton T-Shirts are the perfect addition to any wardrobe. These shirts are made from 100% cotton, making them soft and comfortable. They come in a variety of colors and styles, so you can find one that suits your style.

for-you.name: Folding Bicycles
for-you.description: CycleX's Folding Bicycles are the perfect solution for those who want to get around town without the hassle of a full-sized bike. These lightweight bikes fold up in seconds, making them easy to store and transport. They're also great for commuting or just getting some exercise!
